QuestData.Title: Taking the Fight to Nagrand
QuestData.Description:
**Eyes Only -- Commander $n**
With the fall of the rangari base at Telaar, Vindicator Yrel, recommended we establish a new foothold in Nagrand.
I've taken the liberty of dispatching some of our men and supplies. Rangari D'kaan's already reporting that a new outpost is nearly complete. He has indicated that they are ready to receive you.
A gryphon is waiting to catch you up with the latest caravan shipment whenever you're ready, $g sir:ma'am;.
-- Bodrick Grey, SI:7
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lieutenant Balfor at the caravan in Nagrand.
